content:
# LIGHTING DELIGHT BUG FIX! #

### @everyone Thank you @o_w_e_n for discovering the observer block update bug in the Lighting Delight Addon! This issue caused the Addon to be incompatible with redstone, which wasn't the intended behavior. A new update has been released to fix this bug. As a reward, you've earned the <@&1206955959755472958> role!  ###

## [DOWNLOAD LINK]: https://blockstate.team/projects/lighting-delight ##
author: theblue._.

content:
# ADDON UPDATE #

### @everyone  Fresh release of Minecraft is here, and our Addon has a brand new update! All projects are now fully compatible with the latest Minecraft version. Enjoy the new features right away! ###

## [PROJECT PAGE]: https://blockstate.team/project ##
author: theblue._.

content:
#  COMMENT FEATURE IS HERE #

### @everyone Since our last survey for the website revamp, a comment section has been one of the most requested features. I'm excited to announce that the comment section is now live! You can now express your thoughts and let everyone know what you think about our projects through comments. Please note that we enforce the same rules in the comment section, so be nice and polite. We have also updated our Terms of Service to include a Privacy Policy. Check it out using the link below. ###

## [TOS]: https://blockstate.team/TOS ##
author: theblue._.

content:

content:
#  FURNITURE VENTURE RELEASED! #

### @everyone  Have you ever felt that your house is too boring? Or that Minecraft has more blocks to decorate your house? Well, you're in luck! This addon introduces a new way to decorate with new furniture blocks! You can craft them, place them, and even interact with them! Get it now! ###

## [DOWNLOAD LINK]: https://blockstate.team/projects/furniture-venture ##
author: theblue._.

content:
#  WEBSITE REVAMP #

### Hello @everyone, Blockstate's Birthday is coming soon! So we're planning to  update our website! Give it a new look, some new functionality, and deliver a better user experience! In order to do that, I'd love to hear some suggestion for the revamp, feel free to use the link belows to voice your opinion! Thank you and have a good day  ###


## [GOOGLE FORM LINK]: https://forms.gle/VGkLHuThVqat2DuK8  ##

#  NEW PROJECT RELEASED: REDSTONE ENGINE EXPANSION  #

### @everyone  It's been a while since we last released any project, so I'm excited to announce that Redstone Engine Expansion is out now! Redstone Engine Expansion is a project that aims to expand the capabilities of the Redstone Engine block from the Crafty Plane Add-On! Try it out now! ###

## [DOWNLOAD LINK]:  https://blockstate.team/projects/redstone-engine-expansion ##

### @everyone  I have released a new bug fix for the mentioned project due to the change of how entity runs command 1.20.60 update. Thank to @luciousfox  for reporting this bug! As a reward, please have the <@&1206955959755472958>  role!  ###

content:
# WIND CHARGE DEMO #
 @everyone  The new Breeze mob is a new mob that will be added in the 1.21 update, and comes with a new item called Wind Charge. This item allows the Breeze to charge up and release a powerful gust of wind that can push entities and items away.

Right now, this feature is only available in the beta version of Minecraft Java, and we have created a demo to showcase the Wind Charge in action
## [DOWNLOAD LINK]: https://blockstate.team/projects/wind-charge-demo ##
author: theblue._.

content:
# ADD-ON UPDATE #

### @everyone All Add-On packs that require Beta Script API have been updated! Thank you for your waiting ###

# SQUID REMODELED PORTED! #

content:
# TUFF GOLEM IS FINALLY OUT! #
### @everyone  Who doesn't love Tuff Golems? They're lovely creatures that can be used to show off your collection or simply help you with decoration for your builds! Sadly, they didn't get enough vote. But what if you could have them right now? Well, now you can! With this Add-On, you can now have Tuff Golems in your game! ###
## [DOWNLOAD LINK]: https://www.blockstate.team/projects/tuff-golem ##
author: theblue._.

content:
# WORKING TV IS NOW PUBLISHED #

### @everyone Watching videos in Minecraft? It might sound unbelievable, but now, thanks to this Add-On, it's a reality! Introducing Working TV, an Add-On that enables you to seamlessly play videos in Minecraft. Choose any video you desire‚Äîall within the realm of vanilla Minecraft! No need for mods, plugins, or external software; it's the essence of pure vanilla Minecraft! ###

## [DOWNLOAD LINK]: https://www.blockstate.team/projects/working-tv ##
author: theblue._.

content:
# CRAFTY PLANE RELEASED! #

### @everyone Walking? Running? Traveling by minecart? Feeling a bit sluggish for exploring the expansive Minecraft world? That's precisely why this Add-On was created! Behold! A fresh mode of transportation has arrived: the Plane! ###

## [DOWNLOAD LINK]: https://www.blockstate.team/projects/crafty-plane ##

content:
# Revamping Project page #

### @everyone The project page has remained largely unchanged since the inception of our website. As a result, I've taken the initiative to give it a fresh new look! The concept of a project is no longer limited to Add-Ons; instead, it will showcase a diverse array of tools developed by our team. Additionally, you can now seamlessly filter the entire page to quickly find the specific released project you're seeking. ###

## [PROJECT PAGE]: https://www.blockstate.team/project ##

# BANNER MARKER RELEASED! #

### @everyone  Are you tired of feeling jealous when you see someone marking locations on a map with banners in Minecraft Java Edition? Well, your wait is over because this Add-On is here to bring that feature to Minecraft Bedrock! ###

## [DOWNLOAD LINK]:  https://www.blockstate.team/projects/banner-marker ##

content:
# EXPRESSION PERFECTION IS NOW AVAILABLE # 

### @everyone  Introducing Expression Perfection. This innovative addon brings emojis to the Minecraft world, revolutionizing communication and creativity. From smiles to tears, it offers a whole new way to express emotions as you build, mine, and explore. Get ready to enhance your in-game interactions with a plethora of emojis, adding a touch of fun and immersion to your Minecraft experience. ###

## [DOWNLOAD LINK]:  https://www.blockstate.team/projects/expression-perfection ##
author: theblue._.

content:
# ART ENTHUSIASM & LIGHTING DELIGHT RELEASED üò± #

### @everyone  Two Add-On in one release? Yep üëç  Due to the uncertainty of future updates, I've decided to release both Art Enthusiasm and Lighting Delight for now!###

### The "Art Enthusiasm" brings a fresh chance for you to show your artistic side! With the "Art Enthusiasm" Add-On, you get a cool new method to let your creativity shine through in Minecraft Bedrock. This is fantastic news if you're someone who loves making art. So, let's dive in and learn more about what exactly this Add-On has to offer! ###

## [DOWNLOAD LINK]: https://www.blockstate.team/projects/art-enthusiasm ##


### And for the Lighting Delight, if you've dabbled in the world of Java Edition Optifine Mod, or even caught a glimpse of it in action through videos, you've probably caught onto its mesmerizing feature: Dynamic Lighting. Now, if the concept of Dynamic Lighting hasn't crossed your gaming radar yet, picture this - it's a game effect that makes items like torches, lanterns, or shroomlights held by players cast a luminous glow. And guess what? Brace yourself, because this very feature is about to work its magic in the Bedrock Edition too! ### 

## [DOWNLOAD LINK]: https://www.blockstate.team/projects/lighting-delight ##
author: theblue._.

content:
# ART ENTHUSIASM & LIGHTING DELIGHT RELEASE DATE WILL BE DELAYED #

###  @everyone Due to the postponement of 1.20.20 AKA several important components of ScriptAPI moving to stable, both Art Enthusiasm and Lighting Delight for now will be delayed until 1.20.30. Sorry for this problem! ###
author: theblue._.
